alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 6:23PM EDT until May 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Brevard County in east central Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 622 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharpes, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sharpes, Cape Canaveral, Merritt Island and north Cocoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. Large hail and damaging winds and frequent cloud to ground lightning is expected with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
